title: output.voltages.schema
description: Statistics about the voltage magnitudes at each timestep

Min voltage (p.u.).description: The minimum voltage over the whole feeder at each timestep in per-unit representation

Mean voltage (p.u.).description: The mean voltage over the whole feeder at each timestep in per-unit representation

Max voltage (p.u.).description: The maximum voltage over the whole feeder at each timestep in per-unit representation
